name: set_context
description: Set the working context path for a session

path.description: Directory path to set as context

session_id.description: Optional session identifier. Required for operations relative to context path

name: list_directory
description: List directory contents with session context support and gitignore awareness

path.description: Directory path or glob pattern. Can be absolute, or relative to session context path. Can include wildcards like 'src/**/*.{rs,json}'.

session_id.description: Optional session identifier for context. Defaults to 'default'

include_gitignore.description: Include files normally ignored by gitignore. Defaults to false

recursive.description: Recurse into directories (only relevant if path does not contain a glob pattern)
